EmailTemplate.description: For use if customer responds following RAI deadline
EmailTemplate.name: RAI Process Initiation
EmailTemplate.subject: Return As Is Process Initiation - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Customer,
We have received your response on case tracking number # {!Case.Thread_Id}, but unfortunately according to our internal policies, our Return As Is process has been initiated and we are returning your unit back to your location.
We apologize for any inconvenience and encourage you to contact your Customer Support Representative for any clarification of our Return As Is policy.
Thank you for your time, your consideration and your continuing choice of Honeywell for your repair service needs. If we can be of any further assistance to you, please let us know.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
